channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Summer I and III Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Friday, August 1, 2025 (all day) - Summer I and III student course evaluations are now open. The evaluation period is from 8/1 through 8/15. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please complete evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Friday, August 15, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: New York City - Incoming Student Sendoff 2025
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 12, 2025 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM - If you live in the NYC area, and are home on spring break, we invite you to join local alumni at the West End Labs, 125 W End Avenue, to welcome the incoming Class of 2029 and their families to RPI! Come share your RPI stories and tips with our newest students, and help make them feel welcome and connected.
item.author: Students

item.title: Overview of Webex Webinar New Features Offered on Thursday August 14
item.description: An overview of the Webex Webinar application included in our site license will be provided, including many new features which have been recently added to the application. This training is open to all members of the Rensselaer community and will be conducted remotely via Webex. Don’t miss this opportunity to enhance your skills and make the most of the new features! View the full description and register at https://rensselaer.webex.com/weblink/register/r3ccd51d0b9dae0a77db228dc5ad5c324.
item.author: Community

item.title: Welcome Party for the Class of 2029 | Aug. 10
item.description: Date: Sunday, August 10, 2025 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Join local alumni to welcome the incoming Class of 2029 and their families to RPI! The event is open to all members of the RPI community, including faculty, staff, and current students. Refreshments will be available. Come share your RPI stories and tips with our newest students, and help make them feel welcome and connected.
item.author: Community

item.title: Information Session for 2026 Project RFP: IBM-RPI Future of Computing Research Collaboration (FCRC)
item.description:
Please join us on Thursday, August 7, 11am – 12pm for an Information Session regarding the Request for Joint Rensselaer/IBM Research Proposals. This RFP is part of the Future of Computing Research Collaboration (FCRC), a collaborative research initiative between RPI and IBM to drive world class innovation and fundamental advances in artificial intelligence algorithm, AI hardware software co-design and Semiconductor Technology for the benefit of society. Please register at https://fcrc.rpi.edu/

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
